name: Italian Roast Beef I
author: MICHELLEM66
summary: Tender, seasoned beef that can be sliced and served as a sandwich or as an entree. Best to fix day before serving and refrigerate. Makes slicing easier. Delicious!
ingredients: ½ teaspoon dried red pepper flakes  (Optional)
directions: Pour water into a large kettle, and add bouillon cubes
Mix together the salt, garlic, Italian seasoning, black pepper, oregano, basil, and red pepper flakes on a large plate
Rub roast with 1/2 cup vegetable oil
Roll roast in seasoning mixture until well coated
Place the roast in the kettle along with any left over seasoning mixture and oil
Bring water to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer approximately  3 1/2 hours
Meat should  be tender and well done
